author: taylor
msg: Patch from Scott Weaver to fix getSkin problems with FIVE supplied test cases.
HeadlessUnitTest:  Used as a base class for building unit tests without a servlet container, i.e. it uses TurbineConfig to simulate the TurbineServlet
skin_testcase1,2,3,4.psml: Reflects the correct psml configuration for each of the 5 corresponsing skin test cases.  Test case 5 use 1 as it's base configuration.
TestSkinAggregation:  Runs the 5 test cases per Glen Carl's request
build.xml.patch: adds TestSkinAggregation as a junit test to "unittest" target.

PsmlPortlets.patch:  This fixed problems with the initial patch taking and writing the roots skin to ALL of the child PortletSets.  Removed the method override of IdentityElement.getSkin() which caused the getSkin() method to return the root Skin object causing that reference to be shared among ALL child PortletSets and hence marshaled back to the .psml docuemnt.

author: taylor
msg: 4 PSML test cases for testing Skin Aggregation

author: taylor
msg: - Added 2 services to LDAP-JS.p for easier merging of props when switching to LDAP backend
- Ran "build unittest-security-user" test against LDAP backend. Passed.
